quote: “Christmas is not as much about opening our presents as opening our hearts.”
author: Janice Maeditere

quote: “Christmas is doing a little something extra for someone.”
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: “Let us keep Christmas beautiful without a thought of greed.”
author: Ann Garnett Schultz

quote: “Peace on earth will come to stay, when we live Christmas every day.”
author: Helen Steiner Rice

quote: “Christmas isn’t just a day, it’s a frame of mind.”
author: Valentine Davies

quote: “Love the giver more than the gift.”
author: Brigham Young

quote: “Christmas is a baby shower that went totally overboard.”
author: Andy Borowitz

quote: “The best way to spread Christmas cheer is singing loud for all to hear.”
author: Elf (2003)

quote: “Christmas is the day that holds all time together.”
author: Alexander Smith
